original: Udāna 5.8
analyzed: udāna

original: Saṅghabhedasutta
analyzed: saṅgha bheda sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando tadahuposathe pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmai ānandaḥ tad ahuposathe pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya rājagaham piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Addasā kho devadatto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho devadattaḥ āyasmantam ānandam rājagahe piṇḍāya caranta

original: Disvāna yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvāna yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “ajjatagge dānāhaṁ, āvuso ānanda, aññatreva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṁ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cā”ti.
analyzed: āvuso ānanda aññatra iva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhu saṅghāḥ uposatham karissāmi saṅgha kammāni ca ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha bhante pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya rājagaham piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Addasā kho maṁ, bhante, devadatto rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho ma bhante devadattaḥ rājagahe piṇḍāya caranta

original: Disvāna yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvāna yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mama etat avoca

original: ‘ajjatagge dānāhaṁ, āvuso ānanda, aññatreva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṁ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cā’ti.
analyzed: āvuso ānanda aññatra iva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhu saṅghāḥ uposatham karissāmi saṅgha kammāni ca ati

original: Ajja, bhante, devadatto saṅghaṁ bhindissati, uposathañca karissati saṅghakammāni cā”ti.
analyzed: ajja bhante devadattaḥ saṅgham bhindissati uposatham ca karissati saṅgha kammāni ca ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Sukaraṁ sādhunā sādhu,
analyzed: sukaram sādhunā sādhu

original: Sādhu pāpena dukkaraṁ;
analyzed: sādhu pāpena dukkara

original: Pāpaṁ pāpena sukaraṁ,
analyzed: pāpam pāpena sukara

original: Pāpamariyehi dukkaran”ti.
analyzed: pāpa mariyehi

original: Aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: aṭṭhama
